00027 Connector::~Connector()
00028 {
00029         // Stop all other activities...
00030         TcpServer::RemoveAllCallbackObjects();
00031         TcpServer::Stop();
00032         UdpExchange::RemoveAllCallbackObjects();
00033         UdpExchange::Stop();
00034 
00035         Disconnect();
00036 }

00038 void Connector::Create(int port_tcp, int port_udp)
00039 {
00040         // REVIEW add support of UDP Port
00041         UdpExchange::Create(port_udp);
00042 
00043         SimpleString tmps = MagicUdp;
00044         tmps += ":";
00045         tmps += UdpExchange::GetUdpPort();
00046         TcpServer::SetSyncLinkData( tmps );
00047         TcpServer::SetCallbackSyncLink( ProcessLyncSyncMsg, (void*)this, (void*)0 );
00048         TcpServer::Create(port_tcp);
00049 }

00051 void Connector::SetName(const SimpleString NewName)
00052 {
00053         // Change to all my views...
00054         TcpServer::SetName(NewName);
00055         UdpExchange::SetName(NewName);
00056 
00057         ListClients.Lock();  
00058         for(ListClients.First(); ListClients.NotAtEnd(); ListClients.Next())
00059         {
00060                 ListClients.GetCurrent()->tcpClient->SetName(NewName);
00061         }
00062         ListClients.Unlock();
00063 }

00065 const SimpleString Connector::GetName()
00066 {
00067         // Change to all my views...

00071 void FUNCTION_CALL_TYPE Connector::ProcessLyncSyncMsg( MsgSocketCallBackData * MsgData, MsgSocket * MyMsgSocket )
00072 {
00073         Connector * pThis = (Connector*)MsgData->userData1;
00074 
00075         if ( ((UdpExchange*)pThis)->GetUdpPort() == 0 )
00076         {
00077                 // We do not care about UDP port...
00078                 return;
00079         }
00080 
00081         // Check if the data if Empty
00082         if ( MsgData->Msg.GetLength() != 0 )
00083         {
00084                 // Ok, we've got the Linc Data
00085                 SimpleString tmpBuf((const char*)MsgData->Msg.GetBuffer());
00086                 SimpleString tmpUdp = MagicUdp;
00087 
00088                 SimpleString UDPPort = ValueFromKey( tmpBuf, tmpUdp );
00089 
00090                 if ( UDPPort.GetLength() != 0 )
00091                 {
00092                         UdpConnection udpConnection;
00093                         udpConnection.pid = MsgData->Msg.GetPeerId();
00094 
00095                         // Ok, we have an UDP port at the oposite side
00096                         // Try to accept it
00097                         // udpConnection.SetAddr( (const struct sockaddr_in*)DestAddr );
00098 
00099                         SimpleString ConnectedHost = MyMsgSocket->GetSocket()->GetConnectedHost();
00100 
00101                         int tmpudp = atoi( UDPPort.GetStr() );
00102                         //REVIEW 
00103                         // udpConnection.addr.sin_family = AF_INET;
00104                         // udpConnection.addr.sin_port = htons(tmpudp);
00105 
00106                         // he = Socket::GetHostByName(ConnectedHost.GetStr());
00107                         // udpConnection.addr.sin_addr = *((struct in_addr*)he->h_addr);
00108                         // memset(&(udpConnection.addr.sin_zero), 0, 8);
00109                         Socket::FillAddrIn(&udpConnection.addr, ConnectedHost, tmpudp );
00110 
00111                         pThis->AcceptConnection( udpConnection, true );
00112                 }
00113         }
00114 }

00116 unsigned int Connector::ConnectTo(const SimpleString addr, int port_tcp) // , int port_udp)
00117 {
00118         TcpClient* tcpclient = new TcpClient();
00119 
00120         if ( tcpclient == NULL )
00121         {
00122                 return 0;
00123         }
00124 
00125         tcpclient->SetServiceId(GetServiceId());
00126         tcpclient->SetName(TcpServer::GetName());
00127         tcpclient->SetCallbackSyncLink( ProcessLyncSyncMsg, (void*)this, (void*)0 );
00128 
00129         // REVIEW : done by the TCP Port
00130         if ( UdpExchange::GetUdpPort() == 0 )
00131         {
00132                 UdpExchange::Create(0);
00133 
00134                 SimpleString tmps = MagicUdp;
00135                 tmps += ":";
00136                 tmps += UdpExchange::GetUdpPort();
00137                 TcpServer::SetSyncLinkData( tmps );
00138                 TcpServer::SetCallbackSyncLink( ProcessLyncSyncMsg, (void*)this, (void*)0 );
00139         }
00140 
00141         // Set UDP Port as property for the Sync Link paquet of the TCP Connection
00142         tcpclient->SetSyncLinkData( TcpServer::GetSyncLinkData() );
00143 
00144         // the UDP connection will be filled later
00145         ClientConnection * pConnection = new ClientConnection( tcpclient, NULL );
00146 
00147         // add the client to my list of connected Socket
00148         ListClients.Lock();
00149         ListClients.Add(pConnection);
00150         ListClients.Unlock();
00151 
00152         tcpclient->ConnectToServer(addr, port_tcp);
00153 
00154         // REVIEW
00155         // tcpclient->SendSyncLinkMsg(); => done in ConnectToServer
00156         // if ( tcpclient->WaitSyncLinkMsg() == false )
00157         //{
00158                 // We do not manadge to
00159         //      TraceError( "Could not initialise connection in time, default mode is TCP until initialisation is done.\n" );
00160         //}
00161 
00162         // Copy my callback objects to the new connection
00163         TcpServer::CallbackObjects.Lock();
00164         for( TcpServer::CallbackObjects.First(); TcpServer::CallbackObjects.NotAtEnd(); TcpServer::CallbackObjects.Next() )
00165         {
00166                 tcpclient->AddCallbackObject( TcpServer::CallbackObjects.GetCurrent() );
00167         }
00168         TcpServer::CallbackObjects.Unlock();
00169 
00170         while( tcpclient->IsConnected() )
00171         {
00172                 if ( tcpclient->WaitSyncLinkMsg(30) == true )
00173                 {
00174                         break;
00175                 }
00176         }
00177 
00178         return tcpclient->GetPeerPid();
00179 }

00181 void Connector::SetServiceId(unsigned int pid)
00182 {
00183         // Check validity of a service Id
00184         if ( (pid & ComTools::CONNECTOR_ID) == 0 )
00185         {
00186                 // pid = pid | 0xffffff01;
00187 #ifdef DEBUG
00188                 //              fprintf( stderr, "Warning: ConnectorId could not be 0 for Connector. Value changes to 1 (PeerId = %8.8x)\n", pid );
00189 #endif
00190         }
00191 
00192         TcpServer::SetServiceId(pid);
00193         UdpExchange::SetServiceId(pid);
00194 
00195         ListClients.Lock();  
00196         for( ListClients.First(); ListClients.NotAtEnd();  ListClients.Next())
00197         {
00198                 if((ListClients.GetCurrent())->tcpClient->IsConnected())
00199                 {
00200                         (ListClients.GetCurrent())->tcpClient->SetServiceId(pid);
00201                 }
00202                 else
00203                 {
00204                         delete ListClients.GetCurrent();
00205                         ListClients.RemoveCurrent();
00206                 }
00207         }
00208         ListClients.Unlock();
00209 }

00211 void Connector::SendToAll(int len, const char* buf, bool fastsend)
00212 {
00213         // OmiscidTrace( "in SerndToAll\n");
00214         if ( fastsend && len > UDP_MAX_MSG_SIZE )
00215         {
00216                 fastsend = false;
00217         }
00218 
00219         if( !fastsend )
00220         {
00221                 //send to all client of server
00222                 TcpServer::SendToAllClients(len, buf);
00223         }
00224         else
00225         {
00226                 TcpServer::listConnections.Lock();
00227                 UdpExchange::listUdpConnections.Lock();
00228 
00229                 for(TcpServer::listConnections.First();  TcpServer::listConnections.NotAtEnd(); 
00230                         TcpServer::listConnections.Next())
00231                 {
00232                         unsigned int tcp_pid = (TcpServer::listConnections.GetCurrent())->GetPeerPid();
00233 
00234                         if(!(TcpServer::listConnections.GetCurrent())->IsConnected()) 
00235                         {
00236                                 delete TcpServer::listConnections.GetCurrent();
00237                                 TcpServer::listConnections.RemoveCurrent();
00238 
00239                                 UdpExchange::RemoveConnectionWithId(tcp_pid);    
00240                         }
00241                         else
00242                         {
00243                                 UdpConnection* udp_found =  UdpExchange::FindConnectionFromId(tcp_pid);
00244                                 if (udp_found)
00245                                 {
00246                                         UdpExchange::SendTo(len, buf, udp_found);
00247                                 }
00248                                 else
00249                                 {
00250                                         TcpServer::listConnections.GetCurrent()->Send(len, buf);
00251                                 }
00252                         }
00253                 }       
00254 
00255                 TcpServer::listConnections.Unlock();
00256                 UdpExchange::listUdpConnections.Unlock();
00257         }
00258 
00259         // send to all server where it is connected
00260         ListClients.Lock();
00261         for(ListClients.First(); ListClients.NotAtEnd(); ListClients.Next())
00262         {
00263                 if((ListClients.GetCurrent())->tcpClient->IsConnected())
00264                 {
00265                         try
00266                         {
00267                                 if( fastsend && (ListClients.GetCurrent())->udpConnection )
00268                                 {
00269                                         UdpExchange::SendTo(len, buf, (ListClients.GetCurrent())->udpConnection);
00270                                 }
00271                                 else
00272                                 {
00273                                         ListClients.GetCurrent()->tcpClient->SendToServer(len, buf);      
00274                                 }
00275                         }
00276                         catch( SocketException &e )
00277                         {
00278                                 OmiscidTrace( "Error while sending to all peers : %s (%d)\n", e.msg.GetStr(), e.err );
00279                         }
00280                 }
00281                 else
00282                 {
00283                         delete ListClients.GetCurrent();
00284                         ListClients.RemoveCurrent();
00285                 }
00286         }  
00287         ListClients.Unlock();
00288         // OmiscidTrace( "out SendToAll\n");
00289 }
00290 
00291 int Connector::SendToPeer(int len, const char* buf, unsigned int pid, bool fastsend)
00292 {
00293         int ret = SOCKET_ERROR;
00294 
00295         // If we can not send it fast, let's send is slower
00296         if ( fastsend && len > UDP_MAX_MSG_SIZE )
00297         {
00298                 fastsend = false;
00299         }
00300 
00301         // Search between my client connections
00302         ListClients.Lock();
00303 
00304         ClientConnection* cc = FindClientConnectionFromId(pid);    
00305         if ( cc )
00306         {
00307                 try
00308                 {
00309                         if ( fastsend && cc->udpConnection ) 
00310                         {
00311                                 ret = UdpExchange::SendTo(len, buf, cc->udpConnection);        
00312                         }
00313                         else
00314                         {
00315                                 ret = cc->tcpClient->SendToServer(len, buf);
00316                         }
00317                 }
00318                 catch( SocketException &e )
00319                 {
00320                         OmiscidTrace( "Error while sending to peer %8.8x : %s (%d)\n", pid, e.msg.GetStr(), e.err );
00321                 }
00322                 ListClients.Unlock();
00323                 return ret;
00324         }    
00325         ListClients.Unlock();
00326 
00327         //recherche sur les connexions au serveur
00328         if( fastsend ) //recherche dans les connexion su serveur udp
00329         {
00330                 ret = UdpExchange::SendTo(len, buf, pid);
00331                 if ( ret > 0 )
00332                 {
00333                         return ret;
00334                 }
00335         }
00336 
00337         //recherche dans les connexion su serveur tcp
00338         ret = TcpServer::SendToClient(len, buf, pid);
00339         if ( ret > 0 )
00340         {
00341                 return ret;
00342         }
00343         return SOCKET_ERROR;
00344 }

00346 bool Connector::AddCallbackObject(MsgSocketCallbackObject * CallbackObject)
00347 { 
00348         //printf("Connector::SetCallBackOnRecv\n");
00349 
00350         if ( TcpServer::AddCallbackObject(CallbackObject) == false )
00351         {
00352                 return false;
00353         } 
00354 
00355         UdpExchange::AddCallbackObject(CallbackObject);
00356 
00357         ListClients.Lock();  
00358         for(ListClients.First(); ListClients.NotAtEnd(); ListClients.Next())
00359         {
00360                 if((ListClients.GetCurrent())->tcpClient->IsConnected())
00361                 {
00362                         (ListClients.GetCurrent())->tcpClient->AddCallbackObject(CallbackObject);
00363                 }
00364                 else
00365                 {
00366                         delete ListClients.GetCurrent();
00367                         ListClients.RemoveCurrent();
00368                 }
00369         }
00370         ListClients.Unlock();
00371 
00372         return true;
00373 }

00375 bool Connector::RemoveCallbackObject(MsgSocketCallbackObject * CallbackObject)
00376 { 
00377         //printf("Connector::SetCallBackOnRecv\n");
00378 
00379         if ( TcpServer::RemoveCallbackObject(CallbackObject) == false )
00380         {
00381                 return false;
00382         } 
00383 
00384         UdpExchange::RemoveCallbackObject(CallbackObject);
00385 
00386         ListClients.Lock();  
00387         for(ListClients.First(); ListClients.NotAtEnd(); ListClients.Next())
00388         {
00389                 if((ListClients.GetCurrent())->tcpClient->IsConnected())
00390                         (ListClients.GetCurrent())->tcpClient->RemoveCallbackObject(CallbackObject);
00391                 else
00392                 {
00393                         delete ListClients.GetCurrent();
00394                         ListClients.RemoveCurrent();
00395                 }
00396         }
00397         ListClients.Unlock();
00398 
00399         return true;
00400 }

00402 UdpConnection* Connector::AcceptConnection(const UdpConnection& udp_connect, bool NewConnection )
00403 {
00404         // OmiscidTrace( "in Connector::acceptConnection(UdpConnection*)\n");
00405 
00406         ClientConnection  * ClientCon = NULL;
00407 
00408         // Search in my Client connection
00409         ListClients.Lock();
00410         for( ListClients.First(); (ClientCon == NULL) && ListClients.NotAtEnd(); ListClients.Next())
00411         {
00412                 if((ListClients.GetCurrent())->GetPeerPid() == udp_connect.pid)
00413                 {
00414                         ClientCon = ListClients.GetCurrent();
00415                 }
00416         }
00417 
00418         // Ok, we've got it, retrieve it
00419         if ( ClientCon )
00420         {
00421                 if ( NewConnection )
00422                 {
00423                         // We must fill the updConnection
00424                         if ( ClientCon->udpConnection == NULL )
00425                         {
00426                                 ClientCon->udpConnection = new UdpConnection(udp_connect);
00427                         }
00428                         else
00429                         {
00430                                 ClientCon->udpConnection->SetAddr( udp_connect.getAddr() );
00431                         }
00432                 }
00433         
00434                 ListClients.Unlock();
00435                 return ClientCon->udpConnection;
00436         }
00437 
00438         ListClients.Unlock();
00439 
00440         // Now search in the person connected to me
00441 
00442         UdpConnection* udp_found = NULL;
00443         MsgSocket*     tcp_found = NULL;
00444 
00445         //std::cout << "recherche dans server connexion\n";
00446         TcpServer::listConnections.Lock();
00447 
00448         for(TcpServer::listConnections.First(); (tcp_found == NULL) && TcpServer::listConnections.NotAtEnd();
00449                 TcpServer::listConnections.Next())
00450         {
00451                 // OmiscidTrace( "among  connexion server : %u\n", (*its)->GetPeerPid());
00452                 if ( udp_connect.pid == (TcpServer::listConnections.GetCurrent())->GetPeerPid())
00453                 {
00454                         tcp_found = TcpServer::listConnections.GetCurrent();
00455                 }
00456         }
00457 
00458         if ( tcp_found ) 
00459         {
00460                 if( tcp_found->IsConnected() )
00461                 {
00462                         udp_found = UdpExchange::FindConnectionFromId(udp_connect.pid);
00463                         if ( NewConnection )
00464                         {
00465                                 if ( udp_found != NULL )
00466                                 {
00467                                         udp_found->SetAddr( udp_connect.getAddr() );
00468                                 }
00469                                 else
00470                                 {
00471                                         // OmiscidTrace("Creation connection udp associe TcpServer\n");
00472                                         udp_found = new UdpConnection(udp_connect);
00473                                         if ( udp_found )
00474                                         {
00475                                                 UdpExchange::listUdpConnections.Add(udp_found);
00476                                         }
00477                                 }
00478                         }
00479                 }
00480                 else
00481                 {
00482                         // The peer is not connected anymore, remove it from my list
00483                         TcpServer::listConnections.Remove(tcp_found);
00484                         UdpExchange::RemoveConnectionWithId( udp_connect.pid );
00485                         delete tcp_found;
00486                 }
00487         }
00488         TcpServer::listConnections.Unlock();
00489 
00490         if( udp_found == NULL )
00491         {
00492                 OmiscidTrace( "UDP connection not available fo peer %8.8x\n", udp_connect.pid);
00493         }
00494 
00495         return udp_found;
00496 }

00499 int Connector::GetNbConnection()
00500 {
00501         ListClients.Lock();  
00502         for(ListClients.First(); ListClients.NotAtEnd(); ListClients.Next())
00503         {
00504                 if(!(ListClients.GetCurrent())->tcpClient->IsConnected())
00505                 {
00506                         delete ListClients.GetCurrent();
00507                         ListClients.RemoveCurrent();
00508                 }
00509         }
00510         int nb = (int)(ListClients.GetNumberOfElements() + TcpServer::GetNbConnections());
00511         ListClients.Unlock();
00512         return nb;
00513 }

00515 int Connector::GetListPeerId(SimpleList<unsigned int>& listId)
00516 {
00517         int nb = TcpServer::GetListPeerId(listId);
00518         ListClients.Lock();
00519         for(ListClients.First(); ListClients.NotAtEnd(); ListClients.Next())
00520         {
00521                 if((ListClients.GetCurrent())->tcpClient->IsConnected())
00522                 {
00523                         listId.Add((ListClients.GetCurrent())->GetPeerPid());
00524                         nb++;
00525                 }
00526                 else
00527                 {
00528                         delete ListClients.GetCurrent();
00529                         ListClients.RemoveCurrent();
00530                 }
00531         }
00532         ListClients.Unlock();
00533         return nb;
00534 }

00536 void Connector::SetMaxMessageSizeForTCP(int max)
00537 {
00538         TcpServer::SetMaxMessageSizeForTCP(max);
00539         ListClients.Lock();
00540         for(ListClients.First(); ListClients.NotAtEnd(); ListClients.Next())
00541         {
00542                 (ListClients.GetCurrent())->tcpClient->SetMaxMessageSizeForTCP(max);
00543         }
00544         ListClients.Unlock();
00545 }

00547 ComTools* Connector::Cast()

00551 
00552 ClientConnection* Connector::FindClientConnectionFromId(unsigned int pid)
00553 {
00554         // Check first for a specific connection
00555         for(ListClients.First(); ListClients.NotAtEnd(); ListClients.Next())
00556         {
00557                 if( (ListClients.GetCurrent())->tcpClient->IsConnected() == false )
00558                 {
00559                         ListClients.RemoveCurrent();
00560                 }
00561                 else if((ListClients.GetCurrent())->GetPeerPid() == pid)
00562                 {
00563                         return ListClients.GetCurrent();
00564                 }
00565         }
00566 
00567         unsigned int lpid = pid & ComTools::SERVICE_PEERID;
00568 
00569         // Fallback, search for a port
00570         for(ListClients.First(); ListClients.NotAtEnd(); ListClients.Next())
00571         {
00572                 if(!(ListClients.GetCurrent())->tcpClient->IsConnected())
00573                         ListClients.RemoveCurrent();
00574                 else if((ListClients.GetCurrent()->GetPeerPid()& ComTools::SERVICE_PEERID) == lpid)
00575                 {
00576                         return ListClients.GetCurrent();
00577                 }
00578         }
00579 
00580         return NULL;
00581 }

00620 void Connector::Disconnect()
00621 {
00622         // disconnect every one in my two other side
00623         TcpServer::Disconnect();
00624         UdpExchange::Disconnect();
00625 
00626         // disconnect my connections
00627         ListClients.Lock();  
00628         for(ListClients.First(); ListClients.NotAtEnd(); ListClients.Next())
00629         {
00630                 delete ListClients.GetCurrent();
00631                 ListClients.RemoveCurrent();
00632         }
00633         ListClients.Unlock();
00634 }
00635 
00638 bool Connector::DisconnectPeerId(unsigned int PeerId)
00639 {
00640         bool ret = false;
00641         unsigned int SearchId = PeerId & ComTools::SERVICE_PEERID;
00642 
00643         // Disconnect all connection
00644         ret = ret || TcpServer::DisconnectPeerId(SearchId);
00645         ret = ret || UdpExchange::DisconnectPeerId(SearchId);
00646 
00647         // remove locally the PeerId
00648         ListClients.Lock();  
00649         for(ListClients.First(); ListClients.NotAtEnd(); ListClients.Next())
00650         {
00651                 if ( SearchId == (ListClients.GetCurrent()->tcpClient->GetPeerId() & ComTools::SERVICE_PEERID ) )
00652                 {
00653                         ret = true;
00654                         ListClients.RemoveCurrent();
00655                 }
00656         }
00657         ListClients.Unlock();
00658 
00659         return ret;
00660 }
